participant_1.background:
My favorite holiday is halloween.
I like to go shopping with my daughters.

participant_2.background:
Since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.
I grew up on a large farm.
I just moved from va to pa.
I enjoy doing beadwork and writing my own patterns.

content.text: Welcome to PA! I hope you enjoy it here.
Thanks! So far, it's been great! I'm really enjoying the change of scenery.
I'm glad to hear that! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to beadwork, write my own patterns, and go shopping.
Oh, that's cool! I like to go shopping too. Do you have a favorite store?
I love to go to Hobby Lobby! They have a great selection of beads and supplies.
I love Hobby Lobby too! I always find something I like there.
I know, right? They have everything!
So, what are some of your favorite beadwork projects?
I love making jewelry, especially necklaces and earrings. I also like to make decorative pieces, like wall hangings and ornaments.
Those sound really beautiful! I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure! I'd be happy to show you some.
Great! I'll keep an eye out for you.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
So, what do you like about living in PA?
I love the change of scenery. I grew up on a large farm in VA, so I'm used to being around open spaces. PA has a lot of beautiful scenery, and I'm really enjoying exploring it.
I can see why you'd like it here. PA has some really beautiful areas.
It does! I'm really glad I decided to move here.
Me too! I'm glad we're neighbors.
